articles.description: The dispute over the point in the lawsuit is an example of how routine features like message backups can be cast as partnerships between big tech companies.
articles.content: On Tuesday, a group of state attorneys general led by Texas filed a new antitrust suit against Google. Although the suit mostly focuses on Google's dominance of ad tech, it also accuses the company o… [+2595 chars]
